TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed AudioState extends System.Enum

summary.span: Contiene una lista de posibles estados de la entrada de audio de un motor de reconocimiento de voz.

span.span: Contains a list of possible states for the audio input to a speech recognition engine.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Speech.Recognition.AudioState Silence = int32(1)

summary.span: Recibiendo silencio o ruido de fondo sin voz.

span.span: Receiving silence or non-speech background noise.

.field public static literal valuetype System.Speech.Recognition.AudioState Stopped = int32(0)

summary.span: No se procesa la entrada de audio.
